caption:
Shooting the new campaign for Alessi has been an incredibly exciting moment in my journey as a fashion photographer. This isn’t just another assignment—it’s a full-circle moment.

When I was studying architecture, Alessi represented the epitome of contemporary elegance and innovation. It was the chic icon of design, merging function and artistry in a way that deeply inspired me. Back then, I dreamed of collaborating with such a visionary brand—one that helped shape my creative eye long before I ever picked up a camera professionally.

To now bring my visual world to Alessi’s design universe feels surreal and deeply meaningful. It’s more than a shoot—it’s a creative homecoming.  Special thanks to the Creative director and great Friend @andreaincontri to give me the opportunity to bring back to life these iconic masterpieces ❤️ #design —#architecture #studiosgura casting @simobartcasting styling @sofiabrini__ assisted by @ulianasgura
